description:
Angered by Luffy`s attempt to leave without saying goodbye, Momonosuke rushes with Kin’emon and Yamato to the port from where the Straw Hats are about to leave, thinking back on his days with Luffy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Vorhang fällt! – Ruffy und Momonosukes Schwur
Rideau. Le serment de Luffy et Momonosuké !
Shuumaku! Luffy to Momonosuke no Chikai
The Last Curtain! Luffy and Momonosuke`s Vow
終幕! ルフィとモモの助の誓い
